title: Study — JavaScript + Mathematics — 2025-09-04

acceptance.prompt: Provide a working JS solution for the sum(arr) task.

brief: Today we’ll warm up on arrays, loops, algebra, calculus. Read the brief, then do the 2-minute task to prove understanding.

exercise.title: Two-minute arrays task
exercise.instructions: Write a JavaScript function `sum` that returns the sum of all numbers in an array. Handle empty arrays by returning 0.
